No NHAI/Policy Guidelines / Delegation of Power/18.24/2017 dated 21 Aug 2017 . 2 Vide Circular ibid, full powers have been delegated to ROs for approval of Awards declared by CALA/Arbitrator in respect of compensation for land. 3 ROs may approve the award of compensation, based on CALA Award / Arbitration as per the following guidelines (A) The land acquisition awards may be examined by a Committee comprising of (a) Regional Officer b) PD concern (c GM/DGM RO Office and (d) A representative of Finance attached to RO Office (B) Award be accepted SO as the compensation amount and the valuation of the assets has been done in accordance with methodology adopted by the State Govt. (C) In case it is felt that CALAs Award deviates from established norms RO may submit the award to the District Collector for advice and dispose the matter in accordance with advice tendered by the District Collector. (D) Arbitral Awards may also be generally accepted so as to avoid accumulation of interest liability on NHAI. But in case it is felt that the Arbitral Award deviates from established norms, RO may submit the award to the State Govt for advice and dispose the matter in accordance with advice rendered by the State Govt. 4_ This issues with the approval of Competent Authority of NHAI: 3k7 (Ram Ashraya Singh) General Manager(Coordination) To Q4 3T47 Tv_ All Officers and Employees of HQV ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices.
